Get path to example file

Source: R/drive_example.R
drive_example.Rd

googledrive comes bundled with a few small files to use in examples. This function make them easy to access.

drive_example(path = NULL)

Arguments

path

Name of file. If NULL, the example files will be listed.

Examples

drive_example()
#> [1] "chicken.csv" "chicken.jpg" "chicken.pdf" "chicken.txt"
drive_example("chicken.jpg")
#> [1] "/home/travis/build/tidyverse/googledrive/inst/extdata/chicken.jpg"

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples

googledrive is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
